___y_axis.description: Report column to use for the Y-axis (bar/line)
___y_axis.title: Y-axis column

___renderAs.description: How the report should be rendered/presented
___renderAs.title: Report rendering choice

___query.description: SQL query which is used to fetch report data
___query.title: SQL query

___widget_type.description: Type of widget used to render report
___widget_type.title: Widget type

___max.description: A maximum for a single value in basic reports (knob)
___max.title: Report value maximum

___totals.description: Comma-separated index of columns with totals
___totals.title: Report totals

___label.description: A single label for value in basic reports (knob/pie)
___label.title: Report value label

___columns.description: Comma-separated list of fields from the query used in the report
___columns.title: Report columns

___x_axis.description: Report column to use for the X-axis (bar/line)
___x_axis.title: X-axis column

___model.description: Model from which the report is fetching the data
___model.title: Moden name
